message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be highly beneficial for you.  I'm offering it to you for $15,000.  Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm only willing to go up to $8,500. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,750?

Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,750 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  This is my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
